ªå³²²³®À¹®³®À³®æ«®²³́³²«®³²¹³²±®çªÀ«³®ªÍÀ«¬¾ «¬̧¹º³®¶µ±·Â³¶¾ æÛËÜ¬  æÛËÜ¬ æÛËÜ¬  æÛËÜ¬ æÛËÜ¬  æÛËÜ¬  ¬²±³®±³̄¹Ã³³®µ±·Â³±½®̧³́Á³²¾   Äà¹̄««̧«®²³́»́±³°³®ªÀ«³®ªÀ¾ ÝÛËÜßÝÝ ÛÛËÜßûç å³²²³®À¹®³®À³®̧¹¹́º³Ã́³¶̄³³́²³¹Ã³º̄³́Á±½®²±³̧¹¹́̧́±½Ì¶̄³±®º±®««®Á³́°±®º°¹Á³®æ«®²³́³²«®³²¹³²±®ªÀ«ÀÄ³®ªÍÀ«ÀÄ¬¾ «¬̧¹º³®¶µ±·Â³¶¾ æ¿Üü¬  æ¿Üü¬  ¬²±³®±³̄¹Ã³³®µ±·Â³±½®̧³́Á³²¾   ·¬̄¹̄««̧«®²³́»́±³°³®«³®¾ Ý¿ÜüßËÛ Û¿ÜüßÛÛ Íè³́¸́¹³º²̧«°«®̄±³º³²æ«®²³́²«®³²¹³²±®ªÀ³®ªÍÀ¬¾ ÝÛËÝßÝÜ ÛÛËÝßûû Ï­·Â̄³́¶̄«³®æ«®²³́³²«®³²¹³²±®ªÀ·³®ªÍÀ·¬¾ «¬º³¼¹®³¾ ÝÛËÛßÜÞ ÛÛËÛßûü ¬̧¹¹́º³Ã́³¶̄³³́²³¹Ã³º̄³́Á±½®²±³̧¹¹́̧́±½¶̄³±®º±®««®Á³́°±®º°¹Á³®¾ Ý¿ÜûßËÝ Û¿ÜûßÛÝ ÎÚÃ³ºº±®º¶̧³́º¹³²±®º³®æ«®²³́³²«®³²¹³²±®ªÀ²³®ªÍÀ²¬³®±®¶·Â«°³±®º¶̧³́º¹³²±®º³®¾ «¬²±³̧¹¹́̧́±½¶̄³±®º±®««®Á³́°±®º°¹Á³®¾ ÝÛüÛßÞü ÛÛüÛßüü ¬«®²³́³¾ Ý¿ÜçßËÜ Û¿ÜçßÛÜ éÉ³¹²±º±®º³®̧«®²³·³Á³́ÄÅªêæ¹̧³́Â³±²¬¾ «¬º³¼¹®³¾ ÝÛÊûßÝÊ ÛÛÊûßçÝ ¬̧¹¹́º³Ã́³¶̄³³́²³¹Ã³º̄³́Á±½®²±³̧¹¹́̧́±½¶̄³±®º±®««®Á³́°±®º°¹Á³®¾ Ý¿ÜÞßÊÞ Û¿ÜÞßÝÞ êà³́»º³̄«±®º¼¹¹®Ì¼³́°̧³́°³³́¾«¬̄¹̄««³²́«º¾ ÝÛËÊßÜû ÛÛËÊßûÊ    ¬̧́±½¶̄³±®º¾ «¬±½¼³́°º³̧³́¶¹®²³́³³®º³́³º±¶̄́³³́²°«¶¶«¶ì¶̄³³Á¾ ª¬º³¼¹®³³¹²±º±®º³®¾ Ý¿¿ËßÛ¿ Û¿¿ËßÞÜ   ««®̄«¹̧³́»́³®¾ Ý¿¿üßÛÛ Û¿¿üßçÞ Ä¬«·Â̄³́¶̄«³®¾ Ý¿¿ûßÛÝ Û¿¿ûßçç   ««®̄«¹̧³́»́³®¾ 35774 MONITEUR BELGE — 08.04.2019 — BELGISCH STAATSBLAD

«¬Á³̄³³®·«»¶»³̧«®²¹¹́³̄«±®º±½¼³́°Â³́ «̧̄̄±®º¾ª¬̧³́°́³º³®¹̧³®¹Ã¼³́°¹¹¶Â³±²¶»±̄°³́±®º³®Á³̄³²́±½µ¶̄¹³Ì¶«ºæ̧¹¹́Â³³®́»ºÃ³®¶±¹³®³®¬¾ «º³¼¹®³̧³́º¹³²±®º³®¾  ª̧¹¹́Ã³́±¹²³¶̄¹̄ªªÄÄÅªÏæø«·Â̄³́¶̄«³®¬¾ Ý¿ÝÞß¿Þ Û¿ÝÞßÜÞ  Ä̧¹¹́Ã³́±¹²³¶̧«®«µªªÄÅªÎæø«·Â̄³́¶̄«³®¬¾ Ý¿¿ÞßÝÞ Ä­«®̧»³®²³±³°̄³Ì¹µ±®̧«±²±̄³±̄¶»±̄°³́±®º³®¾ ÝÛüÞßçÞ ÛÛüÞßËÞ ÄÔàÍÉÄÍßÍéÈÊÊÈËñÍÓÅËÈËñÍéÈÆöÓÅÅÒÙÈÉÊÒ÷ÉÐöÈÆÉËÌÈËñÍéÈÐÐÈÓÉäöÈÍ÷ÉÐöÈÆÉËÌÈËÍÇÉäÍÉÈöÐÈÍÅÏÍÉËÄÎÓÉÊÉÐÈÉÐñÍÄÈÆÄÎËÌÉËÌÒÉËöÅèÒÐÈËÍÈËÍÍéÈÆöÓÅÅÒÙÈÉÊÒ÷ÉÐöÈÆÉËÌÈËÍèÈÐÍÇÈÊÆÉäÏÒÐÅÈÒÓÎÌÍßÍÄÈÆÄÅÓÌÍÈôéÈÆöÓÅÅÒÙÈÉÊÒ÷ÉÐöÈÆÉËÌÈËÍèÈÐÍÇÈÊÆÉäÏÒÐÅÈÒÓÎÌÍøåááÚßæääÕÍêÚîØóäÕÖëáäÕäÕùªå³̄̄³±½°³¼³́°¹¹¶Â³±²¶»±̄°³́±®º³®¾«¬º³¼¹®³»±̄°³́±®º³®¾ ÝÛçÝßûû ÛÛçÝßÊû¬«·Â̄³́¶̄«³®¾ ÝÛçÛßûü ÝÛÊüßÝË ÛÛÊüßçÛ¬²±³±®««®Á³́°±®º°¹Á³®̧¹¹́²³³º́³®±®º̄¹̄ªêÅ»́³®¾ Ý¿ÜËßË¿ ÝÛÞÞßËÞ É³²́«º¾   ÅôÉËöÅèÒÐÈËÍÄÎËÍÇ÷ÉÐÈËÓÎËÊÒÈÍÅÅÆÒÑÆÅËÌÍøÈËÍÊÈÍÇÉäÙÅÆÈËÊÈÍöÅÒÐÈËùè³́Á³²Â³̄«®²À²³·¹²³¼««́®««¶̄³±½®±®º³̧»²æ̧ªÄÏÅÌªª¬³®Â³̄³²́«º̧«®²³̧¹º³®²³±®°¹Á¶̄³®̧«®»±̄³®«®²¶³¹¹́Ì¶Ã́¹®ºæ³®²³±½Â¹́³®²³°¹¶̄³®¬²±³»Â³̄±®º³̧»²±®²³́»́±³°³®­̄¹̄ßÂ±³́ ÷¹²³¾É³²́«º¾      Ä±®°¹Á¶̄³®¼««́ ¹̧¹́»««®¶Ã́««°Á««°̄¹Ã³«¶̄±®º̧³́Á±®²³́±®º̧¹¹́±®°¹Á¶̄³®̧«®»±̄³®«®²¶³¹¹́¶Ã́¹®ºæ±®°¹Á¶̄³®²±³±½®¸́±½º³¶̄³²̧«®²³Ã³́¶¹®³®³«¶̄±®ºÀÁ««́±®««®Á³́°±®º¼¹́²³®º³®¹Á³®̧¹¹́²³³́³°³®±®º̧«®²³³«¶̄±®º¹Ã»¼«®²³́³±®Ì°¹Á¶̄³®À¹µ¼««́ ¹̧¹́²³³«¶̄±®º̄¹̄²³Â³µ̄¼¹́²̄̧³́Á±®²³́²¬�«®²¾ ÷¹²³¾É³²́«º¾      

35776 MONITEUR BELGE — 08.04.2019 — BELGISCH STAATSBLAD



éÄÔàÍÄÍßÍÑÈËÒÉÅÈËÈËÎôÍÑÈËÒÉÅÈËÈË ª­®²³́³²«®²³¹®²³́Ä³®³²¹³²³Ã³®¶±¹³®³® «¬å³̄̄³±½°³Ã³®¶±¹³®³®̧³́°́³º³®̧«®«µ²³¼³̄̄³±½°³Ã³®¶±¹³®³³µÌ±̄½²¾ ª¬º³¼¹®³¾ ÝÛÛçß¿¿ ÛÛÛçßÜ¿ Ä¬Ã³®¶±¹³®³®̧«®²³·³Á³́ÄÅªêæ¹̧³́Â³±²¬¾ Ý¿ÝÊßÊÊÛ¿ÝÊßÝÊ ÝÛ¿ÛßÛÞ ÛÛ¿ÛßÞü  º³°«Ã±̄«±¶³³́²³¼««́²³̧«®¹̧³́³̧±®º¶Ã³®¶±¹³®³®¾ ÝÛ¿ûßÛÊ è³́Á³²Â³̄«®²À²³·¹²³¼««́®««¶̄³±½®±®º³̧»²æ̧ªÄªªÌÏÅ¬³®Â³̄³²́«º̧«®²³Â±³́¹̧³®̧³́Á³²³Ã³®¶±¹³®³®̧«®»±̄³®Ì«®²¶³¹¹́¶Ã́¹®ºæ³®²³±½Â¹́³®²³°¹¶̄³®¬¼««́ ÷¹²³¾É³²́«º¾          
ÄÔàÍÄÉÍßÍÅËÐÄÎËÌÈËÍÅËÊÈÆÙÅ÷ÊÒ÷ÉÐöÈÆÉËÌÈËªÝ±³̄º³°«Ã±̄«±¶³³́²³»±̄°³́±®º³®æ¼³́°³±½°¹®̧̄ «®º³®³²́«º¬¾ ÝÝÞÛßüÞ ÛÝÞÛß¿ÞÄö±̄°³́±®º³®²±³²¹¹́³³®º³́³·Â̄³±½°³³¶±¶¶±®ºÁ³̄̄³́»º¼³́°³®²³°́«·Â̄±½®̄¹³º³°³®²¾ ÝÝÞ¿ßüç ÛÝÞ¿ß¿çÛ³°«Ã±̄«±¶³³́²³»±̄°³́±®º³®æµ±·̄±³µ½««́³²́«º¬¾ ÝÝÞÊßüû ÛÝÞÊß¿û «¬²«̄»Á̧«®̄¹³°³®®±®º̧«®Â³̄°«Ã±̄««¡ ÓÕ  ¢¡Ó¥  ©¾ ÝÝÞËßüü����� ÛÝÞËß¿ü����� ¬³²́«º̧«®Â³̄°«Ã±̄««¾ ÝÝÞüßüË ÛÝÞüß¿ËÍ�·Â»²³®««́æ¶¬̧«®²³¹®²³́ª̄¹̄³²¹³²³¹®²³́Â¹»²¶»±̄°³́±®º³®¢  ÕÓÐÐ¢  Õ¢ ¡§©¾ «¬́±½°¶±®¼¹®³́æ¶¬¾ ¬®±³̄Ì́±½°¶±®¼¹®³́æ¶¬¾

ê ÄÔàÍÄÉÉÍßÍÉËöÅèÒÐÈËÍÄÎËÍöÎÑÉÐÎÓÈËÍÈËÍÆÅÈÆÈËÊÈÍÌÅÈÊÈÆÈËÎôÉËöÅèÒÐÈËÍÄÎËÍöÎÑÉÐÎÓÈËÄ��ÆÍÎÏÐÆÈöÍÄÎËÍÊÈÍÉËËÉËÌÒßÍÈËÍÇÈéÎÆÉËÌÒöÅÒÐÈËÝôËëäãÍåäÚó×ëíæãÍÔÔÕÍãäÍØäåäÕÍëÕàáâÖãäÕÍäÕÍåäÚÚäàäÕêÔÚäÍÚáäÚäÕòäåááÚæäúúëÕØÍáóÍåÚëÙØäÖãä×òäÍëÕàáâÖãäÕ«¬Ý±³̄̧³́Ã±·Â̄««®̄³º³̧³®±®°¹Á¶̄³®æ²±³®±³̄̧«®²³Ã³́¶¹®³®Ì³«¶̄±®º±½®̧́±½º³¶̄³²¬¾ª¬Á³̄́¹³́³®²³̧¹¹́Â³µµ±®º̧«®Åí¾ ÝÝüÜßÜÊ ÛÝüÜßûÝÄ¬Á³̄́¹³́³®²³̧¹¹́Â³µµ±®º̧«®ÄÅí¾ ÝÝüÝßÜ¿ ÛÝüÝßûÜ¬Á³̄́¹³́³®²³̧¹¹́Â³µµ±®º̧«®ªéí¾ ÝÊ¿ËßÛÜ ÛÊ¿ËßçûÍ¬Á³̄́¹³́³®²³̧¹¹́Â³µµ±®º̧«®ªÏí¾ ÝÝüÛßÜÛ ÛÝüÛßüÞÏ¬Á³̄́¹³́³®²³̧¹¹́Â³µµ±®º̧«®ªÅí¾ ÝÝü¿ßÜÝ ÛÝü¿ßüçÎ¬Á³̄́¹³́³®²³̧¹¹́Â³µµ±®º̧«®Ïí¾ ÝÊ¿üßÝÞ ÛÊ¿üßçü¬è³́́³°³®«́³́¹³́³®²³̧¹¹́Â³µµ±®º±®º³Â¹»²³®¹Ã²±̧±²³®²³®²±³æ̧¹¹́Á«	±Á««ÎÍÅ³»́¹ò©¬̧«®²³Ã³́¶¹®³®³«¶̄±®º±½®̧́±½º³¶̄³²¾ ÝÊ¿ûßÝç ÛÊ¿ûßçËÛôÄäÚó×ëíæãÍÔÔÕÍãäÍØäåäÕÍëÕàáâÖãäÕ«¬È®°¹Á¶̄³®»±̄º³́³º³Á³®̄³³́²³¶Ã««́²³Ã¹¶±̄¹ð¶±½°́³²±³̄±®¶̄³Ì±®º³®±®²³ß»́¹Ã³¶³ß·¹®¹Á±¶·Â³â»±Á³̄À¼««́¹Ãº³³®́¹³Ì³́®²³̧¹¹́Â³µµ±®º±¶±®º³Â¹»²³®æ±®°¹Á³®®««µ̄́³°̧«®²³Ã³́³«¶̄±®ºÃ±·Â̄±º³̧́±½º³¶̄³²³¶·Â±½µ̧«®ÆÎÅ³»́¹
©¬¾ ÝÝËÝßÝ¿ ÛÝËÝßçÜ¬­®²³́³±®°¹Á¶̄³®¹®²³́́¹³́³®²³̧¹¹́Â³µµ±®º¾ª¬²±³³«¶̄««́±½®̄³º³®Åí¾ ÝÊÊÊßÝÝ ÛÊÊÊßûçÄ¬²±³³«¶̄««́±½®̄³º³®ÄÅí¾ ÝÝËÞßÜË ÛÝËÞßûÛ¬²±³³«¶̄««́±½®̄³º³®ªéí¾ ÝÊÊ¿ßÝÛ ÛÊÊ¿ßûÞÍ¬²±³³«¶̄««́±½®̄³º³®ªÏí¾ ÝÊÊËßÝÜ ÛÊÊËßûûÏ¬²±³³«¶̄««́±½®̄³º³®ªÅí¾ ÝÊÊüßÜÞ ÛÊÊüßûüÎ¬²±³³«¶̄««́±½®̄³º³®Ïí¾ ÝÊÊçßÜû ÛÊÊçßûÊÇôËÈÐÐÅßÉËöÅèÈËÍÄÎËÍÄÈÆÙ÷ÆÉËÌñÍÄÈÆÑÎØÙÐÉËÌñÍÌÈÇÆ÷ÉöÍÅÏØÅËØÈÒÒÉÈÍÄÎËÍÆÅÈÆÈËÊÈÍÌÅÈÊÈÆÈËì ÝÝËüßÜç ÛÝËüßûËØôÉËöÅèÒÐÈËÍÇÈÌÆÈÑÈËÍÉËÍÓÉäÏÆÈËÐÈËÍÅÏÍÐÉäÊÈÓÉäöÈÍÆÈËÐÈËì ÝÝËçßÜüÍ ÛÝËçßû¿ÍÊôÉËöÅèÒÐÈËÍ÷ÉÐÍÊÈÍØÈÒÒÉÈÍÅÏÍØÅËØÈÒÒÉÈÍÄÎËÍÎ÷ÐÈ÷ÆÒßÆÈØÙÐÈËñÍËÎÇ÷ÆÉÌÈÍÆÈØÙÐÈËÍÈËÍéÈÐÐÈÓÉäöÈÍÈËÄÈÆÑÓÉØÙÐÈÍÓÉØÈËÐÉÈÒªÈ®°¹Á¶̄³®æ́»̄¹¬¾ ÝÝÝûßÊû ÛÝÝûßÝûÄã¹¶̄³®æ¼³́°³±½°³¹µµ¹́µ«±̄«±́³¬¾ ÝÝÝçßÊü ÛÝÝçßÝüâ¹³́³®²³̧¹¹́Â³µµ±®º¾ ÝÝÝÞßÊË ÛÝÝÞßÝËÈôÉËËÉËÌÒßÍÈËÍÇÈéÎÆÉËÌÒöÅÒÐÈËÍÇÈÐÆÈÏÏÈËÊÈÍÎÎËÌÈÌÈÄÈËÉËöÅèÒÐÈËì ÝÝûÜßÞÝ ÛÝûÜßüÝÏôÉËöÅèÒÐÈËÍéÎÎÆÅÑÍÈÈËÍÇÉäÅËÊÈÆÍÎÎËÒÓÎÌÒÐÈÓÒÈÓÍÄÎËÍÐÅÈÑÎÒÒÉËÌÍÉÒ­¶»Â±³́ ¹̧¹́±®°¹Á¶̄³®Â³̄̧³́Á³²¼««́¹Ã³³®±½¹®²³́««®¶«º¶̄³¶³̧«®̄¹³Ã«¶¶±®º±¶À̧³́Á³²Â³̄«®²À²³·¹²³¼««́®««¶̄³±½®³̧́Á³²ÀÂ³̄³²́«º³®²³««́²̧«®²±³±®°¹Á¶̄³®¾�«®²¾÷¹²³¾É³²́«º¾­«́²¾   
ÄÔàÍÄÉÉÉÍßÍÎÏÐÆÈöÇÎÆÈÍÄÅÆÉÌÈÍÄÈÆÓÉÈÈËÍÈËÍÇÈÒÐÈÊÉËÌÈËªÝ¹º«µ̄́³°«́³³́¹³Ã¶̧³́±³³®̧«®̧¹́±º³³«¶̄«́³̄±½²Ã³́°³®¾«¬³̄́³µµ³®²³³³®±®²³̧¹́Á̧«®³³®µ³±̄³±½°³̧³́³®±º±®º»±̄º³¹³µ³®²³¼³́°««ÁÂ³±²¾ Ý¿ËÜßÜç Û¿ËÜßûË¬«®²³́³¾ Ý¿ÊÞßÜÞ Û¿ÊÞßûüÄÚ®²³́Â¹»²¶»±̄°³́±®º³®æ¼³́°³±½°³̄««²³²́«º¬¾«¬ ³̧́¶·Â»²±º²²¹¹́»³µ¾ Ý¿ÞÜßüË Û¿ÞÜß¿Ë¬ ³̧́¶·Â»²±º²²¹¹́³±²³³·Â̄º³®¹̄³®¹µ¼³̄̄³±½°¶«Á³®¼¹®³®²³®¶«Á³®¾ Ý¿ÞÛßü¿ ·¬º³®±³̄³́æ¶¬̧«®²³¹®²³́«³®³²¹³²³¹®²³́Â¹»²¶»±̄°³́±®º³®¢  ÕÓÐÐ¢  Õ¢ ¡§©¾É±½¹®²³́³±½²́«º³®̧¹¹́²³¶¹·±«³³°³́Â³±²̧«®²³½«́³®ªÆêÄ̄¹̄ªÆêê²±³»±®ÄÅªê««®²³â±½°¶²±³®¶̄̧¹¹́­́³±²¶̧¹¹́±³®±®ºÂ³̄³Ì«̄«²¾ Ý¿ççßüû 

35779MONITEUR BELGE — 08.04.2019 — BELGISCH STAATSBLAD



ªÅÄÔàÍÉðÍßÍÉËÐÈÆÈÒÐÈËÍÈËÍöÎÑÉÐÎÎÓÎÏÓÅÒÒÉËÌÈËÍÄÎËÍÓÈËÉËÌÈËÍÈËÍÒØÙ÷ÓÊÈËñÍÑÆÈèÉÈÒÍÍÄÎËÍÉËÊÉÄÉÊ÷ÈÓÈÍÓÈÄÈËÒÄÈÆÈöÈÆÉËÌÈËÍÈËÍÈÆÏÑÎØÙÐßÍÈËÍÅÑÒÐÎÓÄÈÆÌÅÈÊÉËÌÈËÍÅÏÍÍÌÈÓÉäöÎÎÆÊÉÌÈÍÄÈÆÌÅÈÊÉËÌÈËñÍÊÉÈÍÆÈØÙÐÍÌÈÄÈËÍÅÑÍÈÈËÍÇÈÓÎÒÐÉËÌÄÅÅÆÊÈÈÓÍßÍÄÈÆÄÅÓÌÍ  ¬È®̄³́³¶̄³®̧«®ÂìÃ¹̄Â³·«±́³³®±®º³®æÁ³̄³³®Á±®±Á»Á¹¹Ã̄±½²«̧®ªÅ½««́¬²±³®«ÅÍªÆêÎ³®æ±®Ã́±®·±Ã³¬̧úú́ÄÅÅÏ±½®º³¶¹̄³®¹Á±®²³ß»́¹Ã³¶³ß·¹®¹Á±¶·Â³â»±Á̄³¾ Í Í  ª¬»¼³®±º³¼¹®±®º̄³¹»¼³®¹µ±®®±³»¼³¶̄««̄æÁ³̄̄¼¬̄³³̧́¼³́ ³̧®¾ ¿Ý¿çßü¿ÍÊÝ¿çß¿¿Í  Ä¬»¼³®±º³³®±½Â³̄¶»±̄³®̧«®²³³®±®º¶³²³́̄̄³®Á±®¶̄³ªÏ¹µÄÅ½««́±®º³́»±°±½®²³¼¹®±®º̄³̧³́®±³»¼³®¾ ¿Ý¿ÞßüÛÍÊÝ¿Þß¿ÛÍ  á«̄»Á̧«®²³³®±®º¡ ÓÕ  ¢¡Ó¥  ©¾ ¿ÝÊÜßüÝÍ�����ÍÊÝÊÜß¿ÝÍ�����Í  É³²́«º̧«®²³³®±®º¾ Ì««®̄«°±®²³́³®̄³®«¶̄³¹Ãª½«®»«́±̧«®Â³̄½««́®«Â³̄½««́̧«®«µ¶»±̄±®º̧«®²±³³®±®ºû Ý¿û¿ßçÛ ÝÝÊüßÝç ÛÝÊüßçËÊôÍöÔóëãÔÔ×Ôú×áÖÖëÕØäÕÍåÔÕÍæ�óáãæäíÔëÚäÍ×äÕëÕØäÕÍÔÔÕØäØÔÔÕÍåááÚÍæäãÍåäÚïäÚåäÕÍáúÍøåäÚùêáîïäÕÍåÔÕÍääÕÍÔÕòäÚäÍïáÕëÕØÍòÔÕÍîïÍ�äëØäÕÍïáÕëÕØ�ìÍ«¬²±³±®««®Á³́°±®º°¹Á³®̧¹¹́²³µ³²³́«³̧³́Á±®²³́±®º̧¹¹́Â³̄¹»¼¶Ã«́³®æ³®±®º³®º³¶¹̄³®̧«®«µªÆÆ³®æ±®Ã́±®·±Ã³¬ú̧ú́ÄÅÅÏ¬¾ Ý¿ËËßÜ¿ Û¿ËËßûÜ¬²±³±®««®Á³́°±®º°¹Á³®̧¹¹́²³µ³²³́«³̧³́Á±®²³́±®º̧¹¹́Â³̄«®º³̄³́Á±½®¶Ã«́³®¾ª¬³®±®º³®º³¶¹̄³®̧«®«µªÆêÆ¾ Ý¿ËçßÞû Û¿ËçßüûÄ¬³®±®º³®º³¶¹̄³®̧úú́ªÆêÆ¾ Ý¿ËÞßÞü Û¿ËÞßüüËôÍÑÚäâëäÖÍåÔÕÍëÕòëåëòîä×äÍ×äåäÕÖåäÚ�äàäÚëÕØäÕìÍ«¬²±³±®««®Á³́°±®º°¹Á³®̧¹¹́²³µ³²³́«³̧³́Á±®²³́±®º̧¹¹́Â³̄¹»¼¶Ã«́³®æ·¹®̄́«·̄³®º³¶¹̄³®̧«®«µªÆÆ¬¾ Ý¿ËÝßÜû Û¿ËÝßûÊ¬²±³±®««®Á³́°±®º°¹Á³®̧¹¹́²³µ³²³́«³̧³́Á±®²³́±®º̧¹¹́Â³̄«®º³̄³́Á±½®¶Ã«́³®¾ª¬·¹®̄́«·̄³®º³¶¹̄³®̧«®«µªÆêÆ¾ Ý¿Ë¿ßÜË Û¿Ë¿ßûÛÄ¬·¹®̄́«·̄³®º³¶¹̄³®̧úú́ªÆêÆ¾ Ý¿ËÊßÜÊ Û¿ËÊßûÝ·¬Ý́·¹®̄́«·̄Ý««Á̧«®²³̧³́³°³́±®º¶±®¶̄³±®ºüôÍÇäãÔÔ×òäÍäÚúóÔíæãßÍäÕÍáóÖãÔ×åäÚØáäòëÕØäÕÍáúÍØä×ëÙàÔÔÚòëØäÍÍåäÚØáäòëÕØäÕÍåááÚÍáÕÚáäÚäÕòäÍØáäòäÚäÕÍòëäÍÕëäãÍåÚëÙØäÖãä×òäÍáÕÚáäÚäÕòäÍëÕàáâÖãäÕÍæäêêäÕÍáóØäêÚÔíæãìÍ ÝÝÊûßÝû ØôÍÇÈÅÓÊÉÌÉËÌÈËÍÄÎËÍÈÈËÍÙ÷ÉÒÇÈÊÉÈËÊÈìÍ Ý¿çÞßüü ÊôÍÇÉäÊÆÎÌÈËÍÈËÍÑÆÈèÉÈÒÍÄÅÅÆÍÈÈËÍÎÎËÄ÷ÓÓÈËÊÍÑÈËÒÉÅÈËÍÄÅÅÆÍÈÓÏÒÐÎËÊÉÌÈËì ªÉ³̄«±®º³®º³²««®±®ÄÅªê¾ Ý¿üÛßÞ¿ Û¿üÛßü¿ Äà³́»º®«Á³̧«®²³̧¹¹́Â³³®̧³́°́³º³®³«¶̄±®º̧³́Á±®²³́±®º²¹¹́²³̧³́¸́¹³º²³¹̧³́²́«·Â̄̧«®««®²³³®±®ÄÅªê¾ Ý¿üüßçÞ ªÉ³̄«±®º³®²±³́³·Â̄º³̧³®¹Ã²³̧³́Á±®²³́±®º̧«®Åí¾ Ý¿ÝçßÊÜ Û¿ÝçßÝÜ ÄÉ³̄«±®º³®²±³́³·Â̄º³̧³®¹Ã²³̧³́Á±®²³́±®º̧«®ÍÏí¾ Ý¿ÛÜß¿ç Û¿ÛÜßÜç à³́»º®«Á³̧«®²³̧¹¹́Â³³®¼³́°³±½°̧³́°́³º³®³«¶̄±®ºÌ³̧́Á±®²³́±®º¾ Ý¿Ûçß¿Ü Û¿ÛçßÞûÙôÍÇÈÐÎÓÉËÌÈËÍÊÉÈÍÆÈØÙÐÍÌÈÄÈËÍÅÑÍÊÈÍÇÈÓÎÒÐÉËÌßÍÄÈÆèÉËÊÈÆÉËÌÍÄÅÅÆÍÙÈÐÍÄÈÆéÈÆÄÈËÍÄÎËÍËÉÈ÷éÈÍÍÎÎËÊÈÓÈËÍÄÎËÍÌÆÅÈÉÇÈÊÆÉäÄÈËìÍ Ý¿¿ÊßÛÊ Û¿¿ÊßÞÝÉôÍèÉËÊÈÆéÎÎÆÊÈËÍÅÑÍÎÎËÊÈÓÈËÍÌÈÓÈÊÈËÍËÎÎÆÍÍÎÎËÓÈÉÊÉËÌÍÄÎËÍÊÈÍÌÈÙÈÓÈÍÄÈÆÊÈÓÉËÌÍÄÎËÍÙÈÐÍÍèÎÎÐÒØÙÎÑÑÈÓÉäöÍÄÈÆèÅÌÈËÍÄÎËÍÑÆÉÄÎÐÈÍÑÆÉÄÎöÒìÍ Ý¿ÛÞßÛÞ Û¿ÛÞßÞüäôÍÇÈÓÎÒÐÉËÌÄÈÆèÉËÊÈÆÉËÌÍÄÅÅÆìÍÍ ßÍ ÓÎÌÈÍÈËÈÆÌÉÈéÅËÉËÌÈËìÍ Ý¿ÊûßÝÝ Í ßÍ ÑÎÒÒÉÈÏéÅËÉËÌÈËìÍ öôÍÇÈÓÎÒÐÉËÌÄÈÆèÉËÊÈÆÉËÌÍÄÅÅÆÍÙÈÐÍÄÈÆéÈÆÄÈËÍÄÎËÍÎÎËÊÈÓÈËÍÄÎËÍÈÆöÈËÊÈÍÅËÐéÉööÈÓÉËÌÒÏÅËÊÒÈËÍªÉ³«¶̄±®º̧³́Á±®²³́±®º̧¹¹́««®²³³®̧³́¼¹́ ³̧®±®ÄÅªê¾ Ý¿Û¿ß¿Ë Û¿Û¿ßÜËÄà³́»º®«Á³̧«®²³̧¹¹́Â³³®¼³́°³±½°̧³́°́³º³®³«¶̄±®ºÌ³̧́Á±®²³́±®º²¹¹́²³̧³́¸́¹³º²³¹̧³́²́«·Â̄̧«®««®²³³®±®ÄÅªê¾ Ý¿ûüßûÞ Û¿ûüßÊÞÓôÍÇÈÓÎÒÐÉËÌÄÈÆèÉËÊÈÆÉËÌÍÄÅÅÆÍ÷ÉÐÌÎÄÈËÍÄÅÅÆÍÙÈÐÍÍÄÈÆéÈÆÄÈËÍÄÎËÍÈÈËÍËÉÈ÷éÈÍÈÓÈöÐÆÉÒØÙÈìÍÍ ßÍ èÅÐÅÆÏÉÈÐÒÍÅÏÍÊÆÉÈéÉÈÓÈÆìÍ Ý¿ÛËß¿¿ 35782 MONITEUR BELGE — 08.04.2019 — BELGISCH STAATSBLAD



ªÄÔàÍðÉÍßÍÇÈÊÆÎÌÈËÍÊÉÈÍÉËÍÎÎËèÈÆöÉËÌÍöÅèÈËÍÄÅÅÆÍÙÈÐÍÌÈéÈÒÐÈÓÉäöÍÍÇÈÓÎÒÐÉËÌöÆÈÊÉÈÐÍÄÅÅÆÍéÉËéÉËÓÈËÉËÌÈËÝôÍÇäòÚÔØäÕÍòëäÍëÕÍÔÔÕâäÚàëÕØÍàáâäÕÍåááÚÍæäãÍÙÔÔÚ×ëÙàÖÍêä×ÔÖãëÕØàÚäòëäãÍ ö±̄¶̄««®²¶«²¹̧«®²³»±̄º³³³®²³¹µ̄³́³¶·Â±°°±®ºº³¶̄³²³³²́«º³®¾ «¬¹ÃªªÄÅªê¾ ¿¿ûûßÝçÍ Ê¿ûûßçËÍ ¬¹ÃªªÄÄÅªê¾ ¿¿ûçßÝûÍ Ê¿ûçßçÊÍÛôÍÇäòÚÔØÍòÔãÍëÕÍÔÔÕâäÚàëÕØÍàáâãÍåááÚÍæäãÍääÕâÔ×ëØÍêä×ÔÖãëÕØàÚäòëäãÍ É³²́«º̧«®²³Â¹¹µ²¶¹Á²«̄±®ÄÅªê²³µ±®±̄±³µ̧³́¹́³®±¶º³º««®¾ ¿¿ûÞßÝüÍ Ê¿ûÞßç¿Í
ÄÔàÍðÉÉÍßÍÄÅÅÆÎÏÇÈÐÎÓÉËÌÈËÍÄÅÅÆÍÙÈÐÍÎÎËÒÓÎÌäÎÎÆÍÛÜÝÞà¹̄««³²́«º̧«®²³³̄«±®º³®¾ ÝËûÜßûÞÍ ÛËûÜßÊÞÍ

ÄÔàÍðÉÉÉÍßÍÄÈÆÆÈöÈËÇÎÆÈÍÇÈÊÆÉäÏÒÄÅÅÆÙÈÏÏÉËÌÍÉËÌÈÙÅ÷ÊÈËÍÅÑÍÍéÉËÒÐÍÅÏÍÇÎÐÈËÍ÷ÉÐÍÊÉÈËÒÐÈËÍÄÈÆÓÈÈËÊÍÉËÍÙÈÐÍöÎÊÈÆÍÄÎËÍÊÈÍÊÈÈÓÈØÅËÅèÉÈÉ³²́«º̧«®²³³²́±½µ¶̧¹¹́Â³µµ±®º±®º³Â¹»²³®¹Ã²³²¹¹́»±®ÄÅªê̧³́°́³Ìº³®¼±®¶̄¹µ«̄³®»±̄²±³®¶̄³®̧³́³³®²±®Â³̄°«²³́̧«®²³²³³³·¹®¹Á±³¾ ÝÊüÝßÞÝÍ ÛÊüÝßüÝÍ
ÄÔàÍðÉÄÍßÍÆÈöÈËÉËÌÈËÍÈËÍÉËÊÉÄÉÊ÷ÈÓÈÍÓÈÄÈËÒÄÈÆÈöÈÆÉËÌÈËÍÉËÍÙÈÐÍÇ÷ÉÐÈËÓÎËÊñÍÍä÷ÆÉÊÉÒØÙÈÍØÅËÒÐÆ÷ØÐÉÈÒñÍÓÈËÉËÌÈËÍÎÎËÍÒÐÎÆÐÈËÊÈÍöÓÈÉËÈÍÄÈËËÅÅÐÒØÙÎÑÑÈËÍÍÈËÍÈÏÏÈØÐÈËÆÈöÈËÉËÌÈËÎôÍÆÈöÈËÉËÌÈËÍÉËÍÙÈÐÍÇ÷ÉÐÈËÓÎËÊÍ È¶»À»¼³·Â̄º³®¹¹̄¹µ¼³̄̄³±½°¶«Á³®¼¹®³®²³Ã«́®̄³́Á³̄¼±³»²³³««®º±µ̄³±®²±³®̄À¹µëë®̧«®»¼®±³̄¹®̧̄ ¹¹º²³Á±®²³́½«́±º³°±®²³́³®±®ÄÅªê¹Ã³®±º¹º³®±°¾ Ì ªÍÄÔàÍðÉÄÍßÍÆÈöÈËÉËÌÈËÍÈËÍÉËÊÉÄÉÊ÷ÈÓÈÍÓÈÄÈËÒÄÈÆÈöÈÆÉËÌÈËÍÉËÍÙÈÐÍÇ÷ÉÐÈËÓÎËÊñÍÍä÷ÆÉÊÉÒØÙÈÍØÅËÒÐÆ÷ØÐÉÈÒñÍÓÈËÉËÌÈËÍÎÎËÍÒÐÎÆÐÈËÐÈËÊÈÍöÓÈÉËÈÍÄÈËËÅÅÐÒØÙÎÑÑÈËÍÍÈËÍÈÏÏÈØÐÈËÆÈöÈËÉËÌÈËÍßÍÄÈÆÄÅÓÌØôÍä÷ÆÉÊÉÒØÙÈÍØÅËÒÐÆ÷ØÐÉÈÒÍ È¶»À»¼³·Â̄º³®¹¹̄¹µ¼³̄̄³±½°¶«Á³®¼¹®³®²³Ã«́®̄³́Á³̄¼±³»²³³««®º±µ̄³±®²±³®̄À¹µëë®̧«®»¼®±³̄¹®̧̄ ¹¹º²³Á±®²³́½«́±º³°±®²³́³®³³®¹Ã́±·Â̄³́̧«®³³®½»́±²±¶·Â³·¹®¶̄́»·̄±³À³²¹³²±®«́±̄°³ÄÀ#ªÀªÍ$À̧«®Â³̄å³̄¹³°̧«®²³±®°¹Á¶̄³®³«¶̄±®º³®ªÆÆÄæåÈÉÆÄ¬¹µÂ³³µ̄»¹µëë®̧«®²³¹̧³®̧³́Á³²³Ã³́¶¹®³®±®ÄÅªê³³®²±̧±²³®²¹µ³®±º«®²³́̧¹¹́²³³̧³́°́³º³®̧«®³³®½»́±²±¶·Â³·¹®¶̄́»·̄±³û ÝÜûûßçûÍüý«þÐ¥ Ó£Ð¢¡ÐÐ¦¥£¡£§ÑÑÐ¢§Ñ£¡  ¡¢§£¢�ý»́±²±¶·Â³·¹®¶̄́»·̄±³ª ý»́±²±¶·Â³·¹®¶̄́»·̄±³Ä ÌÝ««Á³®̧¹¹́®««Á̧«®²³¹Ã́±·Â̄³́¹µ̧³́°́±½º³́̧«®³³®²±̧±²³®²¹µ³®±º«®²³́̧¹¹́²³³¾  Ì­²́³¶«̧®²³½»́±²±¶·Â³·¹®¶̄́»·̄±³¾     

 ÌÛ««̄Â³̄¹Á³³®½»́±²±¶·Â³·¹®¶̄́»·̄±³³²¹³²±®«́±̄°³ÏÞªÀ#ÀÀ̧«®Â³̄åÈÉÆÄû üý« üý«ÊôÍÓÈËÉËÌÈËÍÎÎËÍÒÐÎÆÐÈËÊÈÍöÓÈÉËÈÍÄÈËËÅÅÐÒØÙÎÑÑÈËÍ ­«®̄«³®±®º³®³²¹³²±®«́±̄°³ÄªÀ³³́¶̄³±²Àª$À̧«®Â³̄å³̄¹³°̧«®²³±®°¹Á¶̄³®³«¶̄±®º³®ªÆÆÄ²±³»̧«®ªêÄÅªÏ̄¹̄ªªÄÄÅªê««®¶̄«́³̄®²³°³±®³̧³®®¹¹̄¶·Â«ÃÃ³®Â³̄̧³́¶̄́³°̄̧±«³³®³́°³®²·́¹¼²µ»®²±®ºÃ«̄µ¹́Á¾ ÝÜççßûü ÛÜççßÊüÈôÍÈÏÏÈØÐÈËÆÈöÈËÉËÌÈË É³®̄»̧«®ªÅÄÅªê̄¹̄ªªÄÄÅªê̄±̄»«́±¶º³¼³³¶̄̧«®Á³³́²«®ëë®³µµ³·̄³®Ì³́°³®±®º³²¹³²±®«́±̄°³ªÏÄÀª$À«À̧«®Â³̄å³̄¹³°²±̧³́¶³́³·Â̄³®³®̄«°¶³®û ÝÜûÛßÞÛÍ üý«Í ÛÜûÛßüÛÍüý«

35809MONITEUR BELGE — 08.04.2019 — BELGISCH STAATSBLAD



Gezien om te worden gevoegd bij Ons besluit van 3 april 2019.

FILIP

Van Koningswege :

De Vice-Eerste Minister en Minister van Financiën,
A. DE CROO

*

FEDERALE OVERHEIDSDIENST FINANCIEN

[C − 2019/11495]

28 FEBRUARI 2019. — Ministerieel besluit tot opheffing van het
ministerieel besluit nr. 14 van 17 oktober 1980 met betrekking tot
de inschrijving van de wettelijke hypotheek tot zekerheid van de
voldoening van de belasting over de toegevoegde waarde, van de
interesten en van de kosten verschuldigd aan de schatkist

De Vice-Eerste Minister en Minister van Financiën,

Gelet op de wet van 26 november 2018 tot wijziging van het Wetboek
van de belasting over de toegevoegde waarde wat de automatisering
van de uitvoerbare titel inzake de belasting over de toegevoegde
waarde betreft;

Gelet op het Wetboek van de belasting over de toegevoegde waarde,
artikel 88, vervangen bij de wet van 26 november 2018;

Gelet op het ministerieel besluit nr. 14 van 17 oktober 1980 met
betrekking tot de inschrijving van de wettelijke hypotheek tot zeker-
heid van de voldoening van de belasting over de toegevoegde waarde,
van de interesten en van de kosten verschuldigd aan de Schatkist;

Gelet op het advies van de inspecteur van Financiën, gegeven op
11 oktober 2018;

Gelet op de akkoordbevinding van de Minister van Begroting, d.d.
30 november 2018;

Gelet op de adviesaanvraag binnen 30 dagen die op 3 december 2018
bij de Raad van State is ingediend, met toepassing van artikel 84, § 1,
eerste lid, 2° van de wetten op de Raad van State, gecoördineerd op
12 januari 1973;

Overwegende dat het advies niet is meegedeeld binnen die termijn;

Gelet op artikel 84, § 4, tweede lid, van de wetten op de Raad van
State, gecoördineerd op 12 januari 1973,

Besluit :

Artikel 1. Het ministerieel besluit nr. 14 van 17 oktober 1980 met
betrekking tot de inschrijving van de wettelijke hypotheek tot zeker-
heid van de voldoening van de belasting over de toegevoegde waarde,
van de interesten en van de kosten verschuldigd aan de Schatkist,
wordt opgeheven.

Art. 2. Dit besluit is niet van toepassing op het dwangbevel dat
werd kennisgegeven of betekend voor de datum van zijn inwerking-
treding.

Art. 3. Dit besluit treedt in werking op dezelfde datum als de wet
van 26 november 2018 tot wijziging van het Wetboek van de belasting
over de toegevoegde waarde wat de automatisering van de uitvoerbare
titel inzake de belasting over de toegevoegde waarde betreft.

Brussel, 28 februari 2019.

A. DE CROO

SERVICE PUBLIC FEDERAL FINANCES

[C − 2019/11495]

28 FEVRIER 2019. — Arrêté ministériel abrogeant l’arrêté ministériel
n° 14 du 17 octobre 1980, relatif à l’inscription de l’hypothèque
légale pour le recouvrement de la taxe sur la valeur ajoutée, des
intérêts et des frais dus au trésor public

Le Vice-Premier Ministre et Ministre des Finances,

Vu la loi du 26 novembre 2018 modifiant le Code de la taxe sur la
valeur ajoutée en ce qui concerne l’automatisation du titre exécutoire en
matière de taxe sur la valeur ajoutée;

Vu le Code de la taxe sur la valeur ajoutée, l’article 88, remplacé par
la loi du 26 novembre 2018;

Vu l’arrêté ministériel n° 14 du 17 octobre 1980, relatif à l’inscription
de l’hypothèque légale pour le recouvrement de la taxe sur la valeur
ajoutée, des intérêts et des frais dus au Trésor public;

Vu l’avis de l’Inspecteur des Finances, donné le 11 octobre 2018;

Vu l’accord de la Ministre du Budget, donné le 30 novembre 2018;

Vu la demande d’avis dans un délai de 30 jours, adressée au Conseil
d’État le 3 décembre 2018, en application de l’article 84, § 1er, alinéa 1er,
2°, des lois sur le Conseil d’État, coordonnées le 12 janvier 1973;

Considérant l’absence de communication de l’avis dans ce délai;

Vu l’article 84, § 4, alinéa 2, des lois sur le Conseil d’État, coordonnées
le 12 janvier 1973,

Arrête :

Article 1er. L’arrêté ministériel n° 14 du 17 octobre 1980, relatif à
l’inscription de l’hypothèque légale pour le recouvrement de la taxe sur
la valeur ajoutée, des intérêts et des frais dus au Trésor public, est
abrogé.

Art. 2. Le présent arrêté n’est pas applicable à la contrainte qui a été
notifiée ou signifiée avant la date de son entrée en vigueur.

Art. 3. Le présent arrêté entre en vigueur à la même date que la loi
du 26 novembre 2018 modifiant le Code de la taxe sur la valeur ajoutée
en ce qui concerne l’automatisation du titre exécutoire en matière de
taxe sur la valeur ajoutée.

Bruxelles, le 28 février 2019.

A. DE CROO

35810 MONITEUR BELGE — 08.04.2019 — BELGISCH STAATSBLAD



FEDERALE OVERHEIDSDIENST MOBILITEIT EN VERVOER

Directoraat-generaal Duurzame Mobiliteit en Spoorbeleid
[C − 2019/11285]

19 MAART 2019. — Ministerieel besluit tot opheffing van het
ministerieel besluit nr. 99143/109 van 29 maart 2000 wat betreft de
bepalingen aangaande overweg nr. 6

De Minister van Mobiliteit,

Gelet op de wet van 12 april 1835 betreffende het tolgeld en de
reglementen van de spoorwegpolitie, artikel 2, geïnterpreteerd bij de
wet van 11 maart 1866;

Gelet op de wet van 23 juli 1926 betreffende de NMBS en het
personeel van de Belgische Spoorwegen, artikel 17, vervangen bij de
wet van 1 augustus 1960 en gewijzigd bij het koninklijk besluit van
18 oktober 2004;

Gelet op de wet betreffende de politie over het wegverkeer gecoör-
dineerd op 16 maart 1968, artikel 1, eerste lid;

Gelet op het koninklijk besluit van 11 juli 2011 betreffende de
veiligheidsinrichtingen aan overwegen op de spoorwegen, artikel 11,
§ 1;

Gelet op het ministerieel besluit nr. 99143/109 van 29 maart 2000;
Overwegende dat bovengenoemd ministerieel besluit de veiligheids-

inrichtingen vaststelt van, onder andere, de overweg nr. 6 op de
spoorlijn nr. 109, gelegen te Bergen, ter hoogte van de kilometer-
paal 3.850;

Overwegende dat de overweg is afgeschaft,

Besluit :
Enig artikel. Het ministerieel besluit nr. 99143/109 van 29 maart 2000

wordt opgeheven voor wat betreft de bepalingen aangaande over-
weg nr. 6.

Brussel, 19 maart 2019.
Fr. BELLOT

*
FEDERALE OVERHEIDSDIENST MOBILITEIT EN VERVOER

Directoraat-generaal Duurzame Mobiliteit en Spoorbeleid

[C − 2019/11284]

19 MAART 2019. — Ministerieel besluit tot opheffing van het
ministerieel besluit nr. 99143/109 van 29 maart 2000 wat betreft de
bepalingen aangaande overweg nr. 8

De Minister van Mobiliteit,

Gelet op de wet van 12 april 1835 betreffende het tolgeld en de
reglementen van de spoorwegpolitie, artikel 2, geïnterpreteerd bij de
wet van 11 maart 1866;

Gelet op de wet van 23 juli 1926 betreffende de NMBS en het
personeel van de Belgische Spoorwegen, artikel 17, vervangen bij de
wet van 1 augustus 1960 en gewijzigd bij het koninklijk besluit van
18 oktober 2004;

Gelet op de wet betreffende de politie over het wegverkeer gecoör-
dineerd op 16 maart 1968, artikel 1, eerste lid;

Gelet op het koninklijk besluit van 11 juli 2011 betreffende de
veiligheidsinrichtingen aan overwegen op de spoorwegen, artikel 11,
§ 1;

Gelet op het ministerieel besluit nr. 99143/109 van 29 maart 2000;
Overwegende dat bovengenoemd ministerieel besluit de veiligheids-

inrichtingen vaststelt van, onder andere, de overweg nr. 8 op de
spoorlijn nr. 109, gelegen te Bergen, ter hoogte van de kilometer-
paal 5.850;

Overwegende dat de overweg is afgeschaft,

Enig artikel. Het ministerieel besluit nr. 99143/109 van 29 maart 2000

wordt opgeheven voor wat betreft de bepalingen aangaande over-
weg nr. 8.

Brussel, 19 maart 2019.

Fr. BELLOT

SERVICE PUBLIC FEDERAL MOBILITE ET TRANSPORTS

Direction générale Politique de Mobilité durable et ferroviaire
[C − 2019/11285]

19 MARS 2019. — Arrêté ministériel abrogeant l’arrêté ministériel
n° 99143/109 du 29 mars 2000 en ce qui concerne les dispositions
relatives au passage à niveau n° 6

Le Ministre de la Mobilité,

Vu la loi du 12 avril 1835 concernant les péages et les règlements de
police sur les chemins de fer, l’article 2, interprété par la loi du
11 mars 1866 ;

Vu la loi du 23 juillet 1926 relative à la SNCB et au personnel des
Chemins de fer belges, l’article 17, remplacé par la loi du 1er août 1960 et
modifié par l’arrêté royal du 18 octobre 2004 ;

Vu la loi relative à la police de la circulation routière coordonnée le
16 mars 1968, l’article 1er, alinéa 1er ;

Vu l’arrêté royal du 11 juillet 2011 relatif aux dispositifs de sécurité
des passages à niveau sur les voies ferrées, l’article 11, § 1er ;

Vu l’arrêté ministériel n° 99143/109 du 29 mars 2000 ;
Considérant que l’arrêté ministériel mentionné ci-dessus fixe les

dispositifs de sécurité, entre autres, du passage à niveau n° 6 sur la
ligne ferroviaire n° 109, situé à Mons, à la hauteur de la borne
kilométrique 3.850 ;

Considérant que le passage à niveau est supprimé,

Arrête :
Article unique. L’arrêté ministériel n° 99143/109 du 29 mars 2000 est

abrogé en ce qui concerne les dispositions relatives au passage à
niveau n° 6.

Bruxelles, le 19 mars 2019.
Fr. BELLOT

SERVICE PUBLIC FEDERAL MOBILITE ET TRANSPORTS

Direction générale Politique de Mobilité durable et ferroviaire

[C − 2019/11284]

19 MARS 2019. — Arrêté ministériel abrogeant l’arrêté ministériel
n° 99143/109 du 29 mars 2000 en ce qui concerne les dispositions
relatives au passage à niveau n° 8

Le Ministre de la Mobilité,

Vu la loi du 12 avril 1835 concernant les péages et les règlements de
police sur les chemins de fer, l’article 2, interprété par la loi du
11 mars 1866 ;

Vu la loi du 23 juillet 1926 relative à la SNCB et au personnel des
Chemins de fer belges, l’article 17, remplacé par la loi du 1er août 1960 et
modifié par l’arrêté royal du 18 octobre 2004 ;

Vu la loi relative à la police de la circulation routière coordonnée le
16 mars 1968, l’article 1er, alinéa 1er ;

Vu l’arrêté royal du 11 juillet 2011 relatif aux dispositifs de sécurité
des passages à niveau sur les voies ferrées, l’article 11, § 1er ;

Vu l’arrêté ministériel n° 99143/109 du 29 mars 2000 ;
Considérant que l’arrêté ministériel mentionné ci-dessus fixe les

dispositifs de sécurité, entre autres, du passage à niveau n° 8 sur la
ligne ferroviaire n° 109, situé à Mons, à la hauteur de la borne
kilométrique 5.850 ;

Considérant que le passage à niveau est supprimé,

Arrête :
Article unique. L’arrêté ministériel n° 99143/109 du 29 mars 2000 est

abrogé en ce qui concerne les dispositions relatives au passage à
niveau n° 8.

Bruxelles, le 19 mars 2019.

Fr. BELLOT

19 MAART 2019. — Ministerieel besluit tot opheffing van het

bepalingen aangaande overweg nr. 9

De Minister van Mobiliteit,

Gelet op de wet van 12 april 1835 betreffende het tolgeld en de
reglementen van de spoorwegpolitie, artikel 2, geïnterpreteerd bij de
wet van 11 maart 1866;

Gelet op de wet van 23 juli 1926 betreffende de NMBS en het

wet van 1 augustus 1960 en gewijzigd bij het koninklijk besluit van
18 oktober 2004;

Gelet op de wet betreffende de politie over het wegverkeer gecoör-
dineerd op 16 maart 1968, artikel 1, eerste lid;

Gelet op het koninklijk besluit van 11 juli 2011 betreffende de
veiligheidsinrichtingen aan overwegen op de spoorwegen, artikel 11,
§ 1;

Gelet op het ministerieel besluit nr. 99143/109 van 29 maart 2000;
Overwegende dat bovengenoemd ministerieel besluit de veiligheids-

inrichtingen vaststelt van, onder andere, de overweg nr. 9 op de
spoorlijn nr. 109, gelegen te Bergen, ter hoogte van de kilometer-
paal 8.196;

Overwegende dat de overweg is afgeschaft,

Besluit :

wordt opgeheven voor wat betreft de bepalingen aangaande overweg

Brussel, 19 maart 2019.

SERVICE PUBLIC FEDERAL MOBILITE ET TRANSPORTS

Direction générale Politique de Mobilité durable et ferroviaire
[C − 2019/11283]

19 MARS 2019. — Arrêté ministériel abrogeant l’arrêté ministériel
n° 99143/109 du 29 mars 2000 en ce qui concerne les dispositions
relatives au passage à niveau n° 9

Le Ministre de la Mobilité,

Vu la loi du 12 avril 1835 concernant les péages et les règlements de
police sur les chemins de fer, l’article 2, interprété par la loi du
11 mars 1866 ;

Vu la loi du 23 juillet 1926 relative à la SNCB et au personnel des
Chemins de fer belges, l’article 17, remplacé par la loi du 1er août 1960 et
modifié par l’arrêté royal du 18 octobre 2004 ;

Vu la loi relative à la police de la circulation routière coordonnée le
16 mars 1968, l’article 1er, alinéa 1er ;

Vu l’arrêté royal du 11 juillet 2011 relatif aux dispositifs de sécurité
des passages à niveau sur les voies ferrées, l’article 11, § 1er ;

Vu l’arrêté ministériel n° 99143/109 du 29 mars 2000 ;
Considérant que l’arrêté ministériel mentionné ci-dessus fixe les

dispositifs de sécurité, entre autres, du passage à niveau n° 9 sur la
ligne ferroviaire n° 109, situé à Mons, à la hauteur de la borne
kilométrique 8.196 ;

Considérant que le passage à niveau est supprimé,

Arrête :
Article unique. L’arrêté ministériel n° 99143/109 du 29 mars 2000 est

abrogé en ce qui concerne les dispositions relatives au passage à niveau
n° 9.

Bruxelles, le 19 mars 2019.
Fr. BELLOT

35812 MONITEUR BELGE — 08.04.2019 — BELGISCH STAATSBLAD



FEDERALE OVERHEIDSDIENST MOBILITEIT EN VERVOER

Directoraat-generaal Duurzame Mobiliteit en Spoorbeleid
[C − 2019/11281]

19 MAART 2019. — Ministerieel besluit tot opheffing van het
ministerieel besluit nr. 99143/109 van 29 maart 2000 wat betreft de
bepalingen aangaande overweg nr. 11

De Minister van Mobiliteit,

Gelet op de wet van 12 april 1835 betreffende het tolgeld en de
reglementen van de spoorwegpolitie, artikel 2, geïnterpreteerd bij de
wet van 11 maart 1866;

Gelet op de wet van 23 juli 1926 betreffende de NMBS en het
personeel van de Belgische Spoorwegen, artikel 17, vervangen bij de
wet van 1 augustus 1960 en gewijzigd bij het koninklijk besluit van
18 oktober 2004;

Gelet op de wet betreffende de politie over het wegverkeer gecoör-
dineerd op 16 maart 1968, artikel 1, eerste lid;

Gelet op het koninklijk besluit van 11 juli 2011 betreffende de
veiligheidsinrichtingen aan overwegen op de spoorwegen, artikel 11,
§ 1;

Gelet op het ministerieel besluit nr. 99143/109 van 29 maart 2000;
Overwegende dat bovengenoemd ministerieel besluit de veiligheids-

inrichtingen vaststelt van, onder andere, de overweg nr. 11 op de
spoorlijn nr. 109, gelegen te Bergen, ter hoogte van de kilometer-
paal 9.202;

Overwegende dat de overweg is afgeschaft,

Besluit :
Enig artikel. Het ministerieel besluit nr. 99143/109 van 29 maart 2000

wordt opgeheven voor wat betreft de bepalingen aangaande
overweg nr. 11.

Brussel, 19 maart 2019.
Fr. BELLOT

wet van 1 augustus 1960 en gewijzigd bij het koninklijk besluit van
18 oktober 2004;

Gelet op de wet betreffende de politie over het wegverkeer gecoör-
dineerd op 16 maart 1968, artikel 1, eerste lid;

Gelet op het koninklijk besluit van 11 juli 2011 betreffende de
veiligheidsinrichtingen aan overwegen op de spoorwegen, artikel 11,
§ 1;

Gelet op het ministerieel besluit nr. A/03287/117/59 van 20 mei 2014;

Overwegende dat bovengenoemd ministerieel besluit de veiligheids-
inrichtingen vaststelt van de overweg nr. 59 op de spoorlijn nr. 117,
gelegen te ‘s-Gravenbrakel, ter hoogte van de kilometerpaal 31.407;

Overwegende dat de overweg is afgeschaft,

Besluit :

Enig artikel. Het ministerieel besluit nr. A/03287/117/59 van
20 mei 2014 wordt opgeheven.

Brussel, 19 maart 2019.

Fr. BELLOT

Direction générale Politique de Mobilité durable et ferroviaire
[C − 2019/11286]

l’arrêté ministériel n° A/03286/107/1 du 1er juillet 2014

Le Ministre de la Mobilité,

Vu la loi du 12 avril 1835 concernant les péages et les règlements de
police sur les chemins de fer, l’article 2, interprété par la loi du
11 mars 1866 ;

Vu la loi du 23 juillet 1926 relative à la SNCB et au personnel des
Chemins de fer belges, l’article 17, remplacé par la loi du 1er août 1960 et
modifié par l’arrêté royal du 18 octobre 2004 ;

Vu la loi relative à la police de la circulation routière coordonnée le
16 mars 1968, l’article 1er, alinéa 1er ;

Vu l’arrêté royal du 11 juillet 2011 relatif aux dispositifs de sécurité
des passages à niveau sur les voies ferrées, l’article 11, § 1er ;

Vu l’arrêté ministériel n° A/03286/107/1 du 1er juillet 2014 ;
Considérant que l’arrêté ministériel mentionné ci-dessus fixe les

dispositifs de sécurité du passage à niveau n° 1 sur la ligne ferroviaire
n° 107, situé à Ecaussinnes, à la hauteur de la borne kilométrique 0.685 ;

Bruxelles, le 19 mars 2019.

FEDERALE OVERHEIDSDIENST

SOCIALE ZEKERHEID

[2019/201715]
29 MAART 2019. — Koninklijk besluit houdende wijziging van het

koninklijk besluit van 15 maart 1993 tot uitvoering van hoofd-
stuk II van titel III van de wet van 30 december 1992 houdende
sociale en diverse bepalingen, met betrekking tot de invoering van
een jaarlijkse bijdrage ten laste van de vennootschappen bestemd
voor het sociaal statuut der zelfstandigen

FILIP, Koning der Belgen,
Aan allen die nu zijn en hierna wezen zullen, Onze Groet.

Gelet op de wet van 30 december 1992 houdende sociale en diverse
bepalingen, artikel 91, vervangen bij de programmawet van 22 decem-
ber 2003 en gewijzigd bij de wet houdende diverse bepalingen (I) van
29 maart 2012;

Gelet op het koninklijk besluit van 15 maart 1993 tot uitvoering van
hoofdstuk II van titel III van de wet van 30 december 1992 houdende
sociale en diverse bepalingen, met betrekking tot de invoering van een
jaarlijkse bijdrage ten laste van de vennootschappen bestemd voor het
sociaal statuut der zelfstandigen, de artikelen 2bis en 2ter, ingevoegd bij
koninklijk besluit van 31 juli 2004 en gewijzigd bij de koninklijke
besluiten van 12 april 2005, 5 april 2006, 9 april 2007, 15 april 2008,
14 april 2009, 25 maart 2010, 31 maart 2011, 23 april 2012, 3 april 2013,
14 maart 2014, 28 april 2015, 9 mei 2016, 5 mei 2017 en 27 april 2018;

Gelet op het advies van de Inspecteur van Financiën, gegeven op
8 februari 2019;

Gelet op de akkoordbevinding van de Minister van Begroting,
gegeven op 1 maart 2019;

Gelet op de hoogdringendheid;
Overwegende dat de sociale bijdragen ten laste van de vennootschap-

pen voor het jaar 2019 ten laatste op 30 juni 2019 dienen te zijn betaald
overeenkomstig artikel 92 van de wet van 30 december 1992;

Overwegende dat er nog talrijke administratieve voorbereidingen
dienen te gebeuren alvorens de sociale verzekeringsfondsen, eens zij
weten welk bedrag door elke vennootschap dient te worden betaald,
kunnen overgaan tot de inning van deze bijdragen:

• terbeschikkingstelling door de NBB van het gegevensbestand
betreffende de bedoelde vennootschappen;

• verwerking van de gegevens bij het RSVZ en verdeling van de
gegevens naar de sociale verzekeringsfondsen toe;

SERVICE PUBLIC FEDERAL
SECURITE SOCIALE

[2019/201715]
29 MARS 2019. — Arrêté royal modifiant l’arrêté royal du 15 mars 1993

pris en exécution du chapitre II du titre III de la loi du
30 décembre 1992 portant des dispositions sociales et diverses,
relatif à l’instauration d’une cotisation annuelle à charge des
sociétés, destinée au statut social des travailleurs indépendants

PHILIPPE, Roi des Belges,
A tous, présents et à venir, Salut.

Vu la loi du 30 décembre 1992 portant des dispositions sociales et
diverses, l’article 91, remplacé par la loi-programme du 22 décem-
bre 2003 et modifié par la loi portant des dispositions diverses (I) du
29 mars 2012;

Vu l’arrêté royal du 15 mars 1993 pris en exécution du chapitre II du
titre III de la loi du 30 décembre 1992 portant des dispositions sociales
et diverses, relatif à l’instauration d’une cotisation annuelle à charge
des sociétés, destinée au statut social des travailleurs indépendants, les
articles 2bis et 2ter, insérés par l’arrêté royal du 31 juillet 2004 et
modifiés par les arrêtés royaux du 12 avril 2005, du 5 avril 2006, du
9 avril 2007, du 15 avril 2008, du 14 avril 2009, du 25 mars 2010, du
31 mars 2011, du 23 avril 2012, du 3 avril 2013, du 14 mars 2014, du
28 avril 2015, du 9 mai 2016, du 5 mai 2017 et du 27 avril 2018;

Vu l’avis de l’Inspecteur des Finances, donné le 8 février 2019;

Vu l’accord du Ministre du Budget, donné le 1er mars 2019;

Vu l’urgence;
Considérant que les cotisations sociales à charge des sociétés pour

l’année 2019 doivent, conformément à l’article 92 de la loi du
30 décembre 1992, être payées au plus tard le 30 juin 2019;

Considérant que de nombreuses préparations de nature administra-
tive doivent être effectuées, une fois que les caisses d’assurances
sociales connaissent le montant devant être payé par chaque société,
avant que lesdites caisses puissent commencer la perception de ces
cotisations :

• mise à disposition par la BNB du fichier de données relatif aux
sociétés visées;

• traitement des données par l’INASTI et diffusion des données aux
caisses d’assurances sociales;

35817MONITEUR BELGE — 08.04.2019 — BELGISCH STAATSBLAD



• tijdig opsturen van de vervaldagberichten door de sociale verze-
keringsfondsen, rekening houdend met de door het RSVZ verstrekte
gegevens;

Gelet op het advies nr. 65.758/1 van de Raad van State, gegeven op
28 maart 2019, met toepassing van artikel 84, § 1, eerste lid, 3o, van de
gecoördineerde wetten op de Raad van State;

Op de voordracht van de Minister van Zelfstandigen en op het advies
van de in Raad vergaderde Ministers,

Hebben Wij besloten en besluiten Wij :

Artikel 1. In artikel 2bis van het koninklijk besluit van 15 maart 1993
tot uitvoering van hoofdstuk II van titel III van de wet van 30 decem-
ber 1992 houdende sociale en diverse bepalingen, met betrekking tot de
invoering van een jaarlijkse bijdrage ten laste van de vennootschappen,
bestemd voor het sociaal statuut der zelfstandigen, ingevoegd bij
koninklijk besluit van 31 juli 2004 en gewijzigd bij de koninklijke
besluiten van 12 april 2005, 5 april 2006, 9 april 2007, 15 april 2008,
14 april 2009, 25 maart 2010, 31 maart 2011, 23 april 2012, 3 april 2013,
14 maart 2014, 28 april 2015, 9 mei 2016, 5 mei 2017 en 27 april 2018,
worden de woorden ″voor het jaar 2018″ vervangen door de woorden
″voor het jaar 2019″.

Art. 2. In artikel 2ter van hetzelfde besluit, ingevoegd bij koninklijk
besluit van 31 juli 2004 en gewijzigd bij de koninklijke besluiten van
12 april 2005, 5 april 2006, 9 april 2007, 15 april 2008, 14 april 2009,
25 maart 2010, 31 maart 2011, 23 april 2012, 3 april 2013, 14 maart 2014,
28 april 2015, 9 mei 2016, 5 mei 2017 en 27 april 2018, worden de
woorden ″voor het jaar 2018″ vervangen door de woorden ″voor het
jaar 2019″ en wordt het bedrag ″681.341,33 EUR″ vervangen door het
bedrag ″700.247,09 EUR″.

Art. 3. Dit besluit heeft uitwerking met ingang van 1 januari 2019.

Art. 4. De minister bevoegd voor Zelfstandigen is belast met de
uitvoering van dit besluit.

Gegeven te Brussel, 29 maart 2019.

FILIP

Van Koningswege :

De Minister van Zelfstandigen,
D. DUCARME

*
FEDERALE OVERHEIDSDIENST

SOCIALE ZEKERHEID

[2019/201674]
29 MAART 2019. — Koninklijk besluit houdende toekenning van een

toelage aan de V.Z.W. « SIGeDIS » voor het eerste kwartaal van het
jaar 2019

FILIP, Koning der Belgen,
Aan allen die nu zijn en hierna wezen zullen, Onze Groet.

Gelet op de wet van 22 mei 2003 houdende organisatie van de
begroting en van de comptabiliteit van de federale Staat, de artike-
len 121 tot 124;

Gelet op de wet van 23 december 2005 betreffende het generatiepact,
artikel 8;

Gelet op de financiewet voor het begrotingsjaar 2019 van 21 decem-
ber 2018, sectie 24. — FOD Sociale Zekerheid, organisatieafdeling 58 -
Dotaties en toelagen aan de sociale zekerheid, basis-
allocatie 24 58 41 42.10.13;

Gelet op het koninklijk besluit van 16 november 1994 betreffende de
administratieve en begrotingscontrole;

Gelet op het koninklijk besluit van 12 juni 2006 tot uitvoering van
Titel III, hoofdstuk II van de wet van 23 december 2005 betreffende het
generatiepact, artikel 12;

Gelet op het advies van de Inspecteur van Financiën, gegeven op
14 januari 2019;

Op de voordracht van de Minister van Sociale Zaken en de Minister
van Pensioenen,

Hebben Wij besloten en besluiten Wij :

Artikel 1. Een toelage van 761.000 euro (zevenhonderd eenenzestig
duizend euro) wordt toegekend aan de V.Z.W. ″ SIGeDIS ″, Zuider-
toren, 1060 Brussel IBAN: BE98 6790 0008 6993; BIC: PCHQ BE BB) om

• transmission dans les délais des avis d’échéance par les caisses
d’assurances sociales, compte tenu des données fournies par l’INASTI;

Vu l’avis no 65.758/1 du Conseil d’Etat, donné le 28 mars 2019, en
application de l’article 84, § 1er, alinéa 1er, 3o, des lois coordonnées sur
le Conseil d’Etat;

Sur la proposition du Ministre des Indépendants et de l’avis des
Ministres qui en ont délibéré en Conseil,

Nous avons arrêté et arrêtons :

Article 1er. Dans l’article 2bis de l’arrêté royal du 15 mars 1993 pris
en exécution du chapitre II du titre III de la loi du 30 décembre 1992
portant des dispositions sociales et diverses, relatif à l’instauration
d’une cotisation annuelle forfaitaire à charge des sociétés, destinée au
statut social des travailleurs indépendants, inséré par l’arrêté royal du
31 juillet 2004 et modifié par les arrêtés royaux du 12 avril 2005, du
5 avril 2006, du 9 avril 2007, du 15 avril 2008, du 14 avril 2009, du
25 mars 2010, du 31 mars 2011, du 23 avril 2012, 3 avril 2013, du
14 mars 2014, du 28 avril 2015, du 9 mai 2016, du 5 mai 2017 et du
27 avril 2018, les mots « pour l’année 2018 » sont remplacés par les mots
« pour l’année 2019 ».

Art. 2. Dans l’article 2ter du même arrêté, inséré par l’arrêté royal du
31 juillet 2004 et modifié par les arrêtés royaux du 12 avril 2005, du
5 avril 2006, du 9 avril 2007, du 15 avril 2008, du 14 avril 2009, du
25 mars 2010, du 31 mars 2011, du 23 avril 2012, du 3 avril 2013, du
14 mars 2014, du 28 avril 2015, du 9 mai 2016, du 5 mai 2017 et du
27 avril 2018, les mots « pour l’année 2018 » sont remplacés par les mots
« pour l’année 2019 » et le montant « 681.341,33 EUR » est remplacé par
le montant « 700.247,09 EUR ».

Art. 3. Le présent arrêté produit ses effets le 1er janvier 2019.

Art. 4. Le ministre qui a les Indépendants dans ses attributions est
chargé de l’exécution du présent arrêté.

Donné à Bruxelles, le 29 mars 2019.

PHILIPPE

Par le Roi :

Le Ministre des Indépendants,
D. DUCARME

SERVICE PUBLIC FEDERAL
SECURITE SOCIALE

[2019/201674]
29 MARS 2019. — Arrêté royal octroyant un subside

à l’A.S.B.L. « SIGeDIS » pour le premier trimestre de l’année 2019

PHILIPPE, Roi des Belges,
A tous, présents et à venir, Salut.

Vu la loi du 22 mai 2003 portant organisation du budget et de la
comptabilité de l’État fédéral, les articles 121 à 124;

Vu la loi du 23 décembre 2005 relative au pacte de solidarité entre les
générations, l’article 8;

Vu la loi des finances pour l’année budgétaire 2019 du 21 décem-
bre 2018, section 24. — SPF Sécurité sociale, division organique 58 -
Dotations et Subsides à la Sécurité Sociale, allocation de
base 24 58 41 42.10.13;

Vu l’arrêté royal du 16 novembre 1994 relatif au contrôle administra-
tif et budgétaire;

Vu l’arrêté royal du 12 juin 2006 portant exécution du Titre III,
chapitre II de la loi du 23 décembre 2005 relative au pacte de solidarité
entre les générations, l’article 12;

Vu l’avis de l’Inspecteur des Finances, donné le 14 janvier 2019;

Sur la proposition de la Ministre des Affaires sociales et du Ministre
des Pensions,

Nous avons arrêté et arrêtons :

Article 1er. Un subside de 761.000 euros (sept cent soixante et un
mille euros) est alloué à l’A.S.B.L. ″ SIGeDIS ″, Tour du Midi,
1060 Bruxelles IBAN : BE98 6790 0008 6993; BIC : PCHQ BE BB) pour lui

35818 MONITEUR BELGE — 08.04.2019 — BELGISCH STAATSBLAD



haar in staat te stellen haar werkzaamheden voort te zetten betreffende
de toepassing van de uitvoeringsmaatregelen genomen krachtens
artikel 8 van de wet van 23 december 2005 betreffende het generatiepact
wat betreft de wettelijke pensioenregelingen.

Elke overdracht van schuldvordering betreffende deze toelage is
verboden.

Art. 2. De toelage waarvan sprake in artikel 1 wordt aangerekend op
het krediet ingeschreven op de basisallocatie 24 58 41 42.10.13 -
organisatie-afdeling 58 - programma-activiteit 41 - van de begroting
van de Federale Overheidsdienst Sociale Zekerheid voor het begrotings-
jaar 2019.

De betaling van deze toelage zal geschieden na de ondertekening van
dit besluit;

Art. 3. Als verantwoording voor de aanwending van de in dit
besluit bedoelde toelage, zal de V.Z.W. ″ SIGeDIS ″ de meest recente
jaarrekeningen zoals neergelegd bij de Nationale Bank van België,
alsook het verslag van de Commissaris bij die rekeningen, toezenden
aan de Federale Overheidsdienst Sociale Zekerheid.

Art. 4. De Federale Overheidsdienst Sociale Zekerheid zal zorgen
voor de nodige controle op de aanwending van de toegekende toelage.

De V.Z.W. ″ SIGeDIS ″ zal alle nuttige verantwoordingsdocumenten
ter beschikking stellen van de Federale Overheidsdienst Sociale
Zekerheid.

Art. 5. De V.Z.W. ″ SIGeDIS ″ zal het niet gebruikte en/of het niet in
haar meerjarenplan verantwoorde deel van de toelage, dat uit de
uitvoering van het bovenvermelde project zou voortvloeien, terug-
storten aan de Schatkist.

Art. 6. De minister bevoegd voor Sociale Zaken en de minister
bevoegd voor Pensioenen, zijn ieder wat hem betreft, belast met de
uitvoering van dit besluit.

Gegeven te Brussel, 29 maart 2019.

FILIP

Van Koningswege :

De Minister van Sociale Zaken,
M. DE BLOCK

De Minister van Pensioenen,
D. BACQUELAINE
